tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE network_topology (
    node_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    node_name VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL,
    node_type VARCHAR(50),
    node_location VARCHAR(100),
    node_status BOOLEAN
);

CREATE TABLE network_devices (
    device_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    device_name VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL,
    device_type VARCHAR(20) NOT NULL,
    location_id INT,
    FOREIGN KEY (location_id) REFERENCES locations(location_id)
);

CREATE TABLE connections (
    connection_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    device_id1 INT,
    device_id2 INT,
    connection_type VARCHAR(20) NOT NULL,
    connection_speed INT,
    FOREIGN KEY (device_id1) REFERENCES network_devices(device_id),
    FOREIGN KEY (device_id2) REFERENCES network_devices(device_id)
);

CREATE TABLE network_connections (
    connection_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
    source_device_id UUID,
    destination_device_id UUID,
    connection_speed INT,
    connection_type VARCHAR(50),
    FOREIGN KEY (source_device_id) REFERENCES network_devices(device_id),
    FOREIGN KEY (destination_device_id) REFERENCES network_devices(device_id)
);

CREATE TABLE network_logs (
    log_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
    device_id UUID,
    log_timestamp TIMESTAMP,
    log_type VARCHAR(50),
    log_message TEXT,
    FOREIGN KEY (device_id) REFERENCES network_devices(device_id)
);

CREATE TABLE NetworkConnections (
    connection_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    source_device_id INT NOT NULL,
    destination_device_id INT NOT NULL,
    connection_type VARCHAR(20) NOT NULL,
    connection_status VARCHAR(10) NOT NULL
);

CREATE TABLE NetworkConnections (
    connection_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    device_id_a INT,
    device_id_b INT,
    connection_type VARCHAR(50),
    FOREIGN KEY (device_id_a) REFERENCES NetworkDevices(device_id),
    FOREIGN KEY (device_id_b) REFERENCES NetworkDevices(device_id)
);

CREATE TABLE SegmentConnections (
    segment_connection_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    segment_id INT,
    device_id INT,
    connection_type VARCHAR(50),
    FOREIGN KEY (segment_id) REFERENCES NetworkSegments(segment_id),
    FOREIGN KEY (device_id) REFERENCES NetworkDevices(device_id)
);
